Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; BURNED
Name: Painted pot
Description: Painted pot, which is wide at the bottom and tapers towards the top. The bottom is round with a small base. The red-brown pottery is painted light red with red-brown on top. There are two stylised date palms opposite each other, between them are fields with a net pattern. This piece comes from the settlement of Sayala.
